title: Calories in Mike's Hard Lemonade
meta_description: Discover calories in mikes hard lemonade per bottle, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for this popular alcoholic drink.
assumptions: Standard variety (original lemonade), 5% ABV, 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle, no added mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, serving size, and brand; alcohol content affects calorie absorption. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz bottle of Mike's Hard Lemonade contains about 220 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for beverages, focusing on key macros and micronutrients.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Mike's Hard Lemonade?
What are the carbs in Mike's Hard?
faqs.a: About 32 g carbs and 28 g sugars per bottle, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Mike's Hard have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come primarily from carbohydrates and alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Mike's Hard vs. light version?
faqs.a: Light version has ~120 kcal per bottle, roughly half the original.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Mike's Hard Lemonade?
faqs.a: Low at ~10 mg per bottle; not a significant source of sodium.
